content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Hello Yi-Nuo Wang, let's negotiate the rental price. I want to rent it out for the highest price possible. Please make an offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I'm sorry, but I'm unable to make an offer. As a student, I'm on a tight budget, and I'm looking for the best deal I can get. I'm hoping we can find a price that is fair for both parties.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I understand, but I'm not interested in fairness. I want to get the highest price possible. Let's say 1000 Euros per month.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I'm sorry, but that's way out of my budget. I'm looking for something much more affordable. How about 500 Euros per month?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because 500 Euros is far below my expectation. I'm looking for a price that reflects the value of this newly built, unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your position, Mister Schmidt. However, as a student, I have limited financial resources. I'm willing to pay a fair price, but 1000 Euros is simply too much for me. Is there any room for negotiation?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because you are not meeting my price expectation of 1000 Euros per month. I can't accept anything lower than that.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I'm sorry to hear that, Mister Schmidt. Since we are unable to agree on a price, I respectfully decline to continue the negotiation. TERMINATE
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China
